thread.title: Lisa Haydon Is Enjoying Her Pregnancy By Soaking In Some Beach Vibes
thread.title_full: Lisa Haydon Is Enjoying Her Pregnancy By Soaking In Some Beach Vibes

title: Lisa Haydon Is Enjoying Her Pregnancy By Soaking In Some Beach Vibes
text:
facebook 
Lisa Haydon shocked the world when she shared a picture of her baby bump, a few weeks back. The image had the actress sporting a bikini with the caption, 'humble beginning'. The Ae Dil Hai Mushkil star got married in October, last year, to her long-time beau, Dino Lalvani, at a beach wedding. Currently, the supermodel/actress is sharing some amazing pictures of chilling at the beach with her friends. The mommy-to-be is definitely having fun. See the snaps below. A photo posted by Lisa Haydon (@lisahaydon) on Feb 3, 2017 at 4:40am PST 🦋🌼🦄 A photo posted by Lisa Haydon (@lisahaydon) on Feb 3, 2017 at 4:30am PST 🌊🚴🏻‍♀️ A photo posted by Lisa Haydon (@lisahaydon) on Jan 28, 2017 at 2:58am PST Photo Credit: Instagram
